June 4, 1972 D Buxton Festival (Junior Class)
Buxton Festival (Junior Class) 104 Own Choice Test Piece Contest Buxton Festival buxton-festival-junior-class
Playhouse Theatre, Buxton, Derbyshire Prizes - 1st £20 and trophy, 2nd £6, 3rd £4. 3 bands competed.
Dec. 16, 2016, 11:47 p.m. Dec. 16, 2016, 11:52 p.m.
1 Brodsworth Colliery Junior B. Ralfe
2 Glossopdale Community College Jack Fletcher
3 Mossley Hollins High School Band B. Farrar
